name: acetonitrile to generic market for solvent for chromatography analysis | solvent for chromatography analysis | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2981/documentation

This activity links the output of the market for acetonitrile to the generic market for solvent for chromatography analysis.;The market for acetonitrile is also a niche market. When a process demands acetonitrile as a solvent for chromatography analysis,  this product needs to be obtained from the market for acetonitrile. In the other hand, when the process does not require a solvent for chromatography analysis with specific attributes, the consumption will be satisfied in the generic market for solvent for chromatography analysis.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2022:Manufacture of paints, varnishes and similar coatings, printing ink and mas
